name: Levis Robo
description:
Levis Robo is a 2D platformer game made by TJC_Plays and ERmilburn02.

The aim of the game is to beat each level while avoiding being hit by the slime enemies. Getting hit even once will kill you and make you redo the level from the start.

The goal appears as a checker-pattern tile in the ground. Once you reach this, you have completed the stage.

Features of the game currently include: Breakable Bricks, Coins, Enemies, Checkpoints, Item Blocks.

Many of the game's planned features are not yet implemented as the developers have had limited time to create this current alpha version. The game is currently just a proof of concept of what it will be like in the future.

You will not yet find any Checkpoints, or Item Blocks in the game, but they will be added at a later date.

Standard platformer controls.

Credits

Code - ERmilburn02

Design - TJC_Plays
